timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to move INFINISPAN_SERVER_RULE to an interface?  That way we don't need to duplicate for every remote-cache-based test class hierarchy.
timeline.author: pferraro

replies.bodyText: It appears it's not possible, it needs to be a static field on the test class. Nevertheless, I extracted the org.junit.rules.TestRule into a separate method, so the setup is just 1 annotated field.
replies.author: rhusar
